query:
SELECT distinct application, 'main query' query_type, controlname as queryname, 
       first_value( executiontime) OVER (PARTITION BY controlname ORDER BY creationdate DESC) as exectime
FROM admlogquery
union
SELECT distinct application, 'sub query' as query_type, controlname || ' - ' || query_name  as queryname, 
       first_value( query_execution_time) OVER (PARTITION BY controlname || ' - ' || query_name ORDER BY creationdate DESC) as exectime
FROM v_admlogquery_details
where query_execution_time is not null
order by exectime desc
name: GTI - queries with last execution time
description: List queries sorted with last execution time
